After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: Mobile maintenance service utilization rate.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers using mobile maintenance services compared to the total number of maintenance service requests, indicating service adoption.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: (Number of Mobile Maintenance Services Used / Total Number of Scheduled Mobile Maintenance Services) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with mobile maintenance services.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with mobile maintenance services, including service quality, response time, and overall experience, gathered through surveys.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Mobile Maintenance Services

After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: Mobile maintenance response time.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to mobile maintenance service requests, reflecting the efficiency of the mobile maintenance service.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Respond to Mobile Maintenance Requests

After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from mobile maintenance.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from mobile maintenance services compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: (Revenue from Mobile Maintenance Services - Cost of Mobile Maintenance Services) / Cost of Mobile Maintenance Services * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: Cost per mobile maintenance service.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each mobile maintenance service provided, including labor, parts, and overhead expenses.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: Total Cost of Mobile Maintenance Services / Total Number of Mobile Maintenance Services

After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: Mobile maintenance service coverage area expansion rate.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Rate at which the coverage area for mobile maintenance services is expanded, measured by the increase in geographic service areas per year.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: (Increase in Coverage Area / Previous Coverage Area) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: Compliance with mobile maintenance service standards.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Degree to which mobile maintenance services adhere to established service standards, measured through audits and performance evaluations.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Mobile Maintenance Services / Total Number of Mobile Maintenance Services) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: Mobile maintenance service uptime and reliability.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of the availability and reliability of mobile maintenance services, including the percentage of time services are available and meet performance expectations.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: (Total Uptime Hours / Total Scheduled Hours) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: On-demand service request volume.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Total number of on-demand service requests received over a specific period, indicating the demand for on-demand services.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: Total Number of On-Demand Service Requests Received

After Sales+Mobile Services.KPIS: On-demand service response time.
After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to on-demand service requests from the time of request to initial contact, reflecting responsiveness to customer needs.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Respond to On-Demand Service Requests

After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for On-Demand Services

After Sales+Mobile Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of on-demand service requests completed compared to the total number of requests received, reflecting the success of fulfilling service requests.
After Sales+Mobile Services.FORMULA: (Number of Completed On-Demand Services / Total Number of On-Demand Service Requests) * 100
